review: Amazing, useful device.  I am not great with technology and this was fairly easy to set up.  Much quicker than Apple TV and chapter. Great for streaming Netflix from a laptop to the TV.  Also videos.  I thought it was so handy I gave several to people at the holiday.
author: Dana W

review: This streaming player is no match for the Amazon fire stick unless you want to chrome cast from your computer.
author: mkrehel

review: It is so good. I totally recommend it. It is very easy to use.
author: Hossam Mikhail "el.hoss"

review: Love it!!!! Easy to install.. Great quality
author: Alecia Howard "alecia"
